info.name: Clean WBC
info.description: Removes obsolete information such as detailed user stats from the new WBC forums.
info.additionalInfo:
- Added options to let the user decide what to hide.
- Hide more parts: thanks box, tags list, thread info, navigation links, footer with links, page footer

- Changed domain to regexp matching so it only affects thread view and does not break gallery and member list

settings.label: Hide tags list at top of thread
